title: David Spares Saul Again
summary: David again has the chance to kill Saul, this time while he sleeps in the camp. Instead, he takes Saul’s spear and water jug. David confronts Saul from a distance, showing his innocence. Saul acknowledges David’s righteousness once more.

faq.question: What did David take from Saul’s camp?
faq.answer: Saul’s spear and water jug as proof he could have killed him.

faq.question: How did Saul respond?
faq.answer: He confessed his sin and blessed David, realizing David would succeed him.
